forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 53F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 38F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 55F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
